ygData.subject: Missing Files and Web UI
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello All, I am looking through the source code for Heritrix 3.1 along with its documentation and I ve run across a few files that I don t seem to have

Hello All,

I am looking through the source code for Heritrix 3.1 along wit=
h its documentation and I've run across a few files that I don't seem to ha=
ve anywhere. In "packages.html" inside the main package where Heritrix.java=
 is located it talks about a couple things like "admin" which should be loc=
ated at: {@link org.archive.crawler.admin org.archive.crawler.admin}, which=
 is nowhere to be found, 
as well as the datamodel which is located at:{@li=
nk org.archive.crawler.datamodel org.archive.crawler.datamodel}. I have the=
 datamodel package, but it only contains one java file for UriUniqFilter.ja=
va, when the documentation says it is also supposed to contain files such a=
s CandidateURI and CrawlURI, which are both essential. The crawler works, s=
o assume they are at least somewhere. Is this just bad documentation? Or ar=
e some of these files gone?

On a different note, I would also like to find=
 the files for the Web UI itself. I assume they are JSP files or Servlets. =
Could someone point me to what package, or folder they might be located in?=


Thanks!
Keith
